resources.string: The parity of the week is determined by a special method.If the week number is divided into two without remainder, it is an even week, if not, it is an odd week. As a rule, the first school week is odd, then they alternate.
I am a novice Android developer in Kotlin. I spend my free time studying new mobile technologies, testing newfangled features and developing my project that should make life easier for students.
The application is being developed as a graduation thesis project of a cadet of group 3842.9 2024 using the Kotlin programming language, MVVM architecture.
The best way to contact me is the feedback bot in Telegram @AlcyoneFD_bot
Use this switch to turn on the dark theme
Turn it on if the parity doesnt match your study schedule. It is recommended to restart the application to apply the settings.
Select your group to get the current schedule. It is recommended to restart the application to apply the settings.
